thread.title: Two jailed in Kano for raping 3 under-aged girls, give them N100
thread.title_full: Two jailed in Kano for raping 3 under-aged girls, give them N100

author: Tony
title: Two jailed in Kano for raping 3 under-aged girls, give them N100

organizations.name: bichi local government area of kano state

text:
Home » News » Two jailed in Kano for raping 3 under-aged girls, give them N100 Two jailed in Kano for raping 3 under-aged girls, give them N100 On 1:56 am In News by Tony Comments 
T wo men, who allegedly raped three under-aged girls, were, yesterday, remanded in prison custody by a Kano magistrate’s court. 
The accused, Babangida Ubale, 30, and Isyaku Musa, 35, all residents of Bichi Local Government Area of Kano State, are facing a charge of rape. 
The prosecutor, ASP Rufa’i Inusa, told the court that Ubale and Musa on December 14, 2016, deceived and lured the three girls, who were food hawkers, into an uncompleted building at Unguwar Yamma Quarters in Bichi Local Government Area of Kano State. 
“In the process, the two accused removed the three girls’ pants and had unlawful sexual intercourse with them one after the other and gave them N100,” Inusa said. 
He said the victims were taken to Bichi General Hospital for treatment. 
The duo pleaded not guilty. 
Chief Magistrate Muhammad Jibril ordered them remanded in prison custody and adjourned the case to February 22.
